personal.name: Abrar Mubeen
personal.title: Software Engineering Student & Full-Stack Developer
personal.summary: Results-driven Software Engineering undergraduate with robust experience in full-stack web development, data science, and team leadership. Proven track record of delivering scalable, user-centric solutions for university and real-world clients.

experience.title: Website Developer
description: Developed a full-stack event registration website for CodeRush 2025 using Laravel, Blade, Tailwind, and MySQL
Led UI/UX design and implemented Git-based workflow in a 4-member team
Deployed on Apache with reverse proxy; managed over 400 registrations across 6 events

experience.title: Website Developer
description: Built a blogging and event hosting platform for IUT FIS using Laravel, MySQL, and Bootstrap
Designed and implemented UI/UX with Blade components
Collaborated in a team using Git for version control

projects.title: IUT Distant Learning Theater Booking System
projects.description: Co-developed a booking and meeting management platform for IUT DLT; streamlined reservations for 200+ users.

projects.title: Event Registration Platform for CodeRush 2025
projects.description: Built a scalable registration system handling 400+ entries across 6 events; improved registration efficiency by 30%.

projects.title: Service Provider Marketplace Website
projects.description: Developed and deployed a live marketplace platform connecting local service providers with clients.

projects.title: Comparative Analysis of Pretrained ImageNet Models
projects.description: Conducted a comparative study of 15 CNN models for static hand gesture recognition; found ConvNextBase best performing.

projects.title: VMATH – A Comprehensive Java Math Library
projects.description: Co-developed a Java library with 8+ packages and 100+ optimized functions for advanced mathematical computation.

projects.title: MathXplorer – Smart Math Contest Platform
projects.description: Built a contest platform with ELO rating and AI chat integration; enabled automated contest management.
